name: Luwis 2D Airplane duel
description:
A two player 2D game, where you steer your airplane by solely by accelerating or not. Collect coins and shoot your opponent to earn points. A coin is worth 1 point and being shoot or colliding with the ground gives 5 points to your opponent. 

Player one keys: "Q" and "W".

Player two keys: "I" and "O".

Restart with spacebar.

Unfortunately I have not been able to adjust the text fonts and placements depending on screen resolution, so some things might look bad.
